class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/PTPJointController
class.description: This controller publishes the ptp commands to the robot.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/FreeDriveController
class.description: This controller sets free drive mode for robot.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/RecorderController
class.description: This controller records and replay trajectories.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/PTPTCPController
class.description: This controller send command to the robot for ptp tcp transfer.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/JointJoggingController
class.description: This controller sends commands to jog the robot joint-wise.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/VelocityController
class.description: This controller sends commands joint velocity commands to the robot.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/CartesianJoggingController
class.description: This controller sends commands to jog the robot axis-wise.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/JointImpedanceController
class.description: This controller sets the joint impedance of the robot.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: This controller sets the cartesian impedance of the robot.

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/GravityCompEffortController
class.description: This controller sets the joint effort commands with gravity compensation to robot

class.name: addverb_cobot_controllers/EffortController
class.description: This controller sets the joint effort commands to robot.
